short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts track IDs from SoundCloud comments. This will help you grab the tracks you love!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of scrolling through endless comments to find the tracks you love? This Chrome extension makes it easy for music lovers to extract and share track names directly from SoundCloud comments. 

Could you copy the tracks to your clipboard and paste them into your text editor of choice? From there, easily add them to playlists or purchase them online. Say goodbye to tedious searches and enjoy seamless track discovery!

How to use:

1. Download and add the Chrome extension to your browser. 
2. Pin the icon to your browser
3. Go to Soundcloud and go to a mix you love! 
4. Let it load and scroll down to the bottom of the comments section.
5. Click our icon, and all the track IDs will be ready for you to copy. 
6. Clear the list, rinse and repeat. 
7. Make some sick playlists.

Enjoy!
